description: Certificate of lawfulness (existing) in connection with the existing use of building (six storeys) for offices and meeting space for charities and not for profit groups, along with crèche facilities for service users on the 1st floor and car parking to rear of building (including disabled parking facilities).
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: Please be advised that the Local Planning Authority considers that additional evidence in the form of entire leases dating back at least 10 years, utility bills, nursery roles/ staff lists etc., accounts and affidavits are required in order to prove that on the 'balance of probability' the building has been used as offices and meeting spaces for women's charities, crèche facilities and associated car parking to the rear of the building for a continuous period in excess of 10 years preceding the date of the application. 

Full planning permission may be required for the change of use of the building to offices, meeting spaces, nursery/ crèche facility and car parking if no further evidence is available to prove its operation for a continuous period in excess of 10 years.
